snippet: Werner Herzog’s “Salt and Fire” and 13 other films will compete for the Golden Goblet at this year’s festival, which starts June 11.
abstract: Shanghai International Film Festival announces lineup, including films by Werner Herzog, Bruce Beresford and handful of Asian directors.
lead_paragraph: Werner Herzog’s “Salt and Fire” and 13 other films will compete for the Golden Goblet at this year’s festival, which starts June 11.

headline.main: Herzog Premiere to Headline Shanghai Film Festival
